tweet: Wow, Singapore's tax authority IRAS proposes to exempt all usage of cryptocurrency as medium of exchange (MoE) from goods and services tax (GST)!  “Examples of digital payment tokens are Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Dash, Monero, Ripple and Zcash,” IRAS added in the proposal.
